publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3731 Alison McInnes: Fairtrade Inverurie—That the Parliament congratulates Inverurie on achieving Fairtrade Town status; welcomes the commitment that Inverurie has demonstrated, in reaching Fairtrade status, to supporting fairtrade principles such as long-term, mutually beneficial partnerships between trade partners and fair prices agreed with producers; notes the benefits that the fairtrade scheme brings for farmers and workers in the developing world, and therefore encourages more communities across Scotland to work towards becoming Fairtrade Towns. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, Mike Rumbles*, Brian Adam*, David Stewart*, Bob Doris*, Robert Brown*, Marlyn Glen*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Patricia Ferguson*, Des McNulty*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*, Maureen Watt*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3731 Fairtrade Inverurie (lodged on 18 March 2009) Elaine Smith*, Ken Macintosh*, Aileen Campbell*, Cathy Peattie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3731 Alison McInnes: Fairtrade Inverurie—That the Parliament congratulates Inverurie on achieving Fairtrade Town status; welcomes the commitment that Inverurie has demonstrated, in reaching Fairtrade status, to supporting fairtrade principles such as long-term, mutually beneficial partnerships between trade partners and fair prices agreed with producers; notes the benefits that the fairtrade scheme brings for farmers and workers in the developing world, and therefore encourages more communities across Scotland to work towards becoming Fairtrade towns. Supported by: Robin Harper, Bill Butler, Mike Rumbles, Brian Adam, David Stewart, Bob Doris, Robert Brown, Marlyn Glen, Hugh O’Donnell, Patricia Ferguson, Des McNulty, Stuart McMillan, Trish Godman, Maureen Watt, Nanette Milne, Bill Kidd, Elaine Smith, Ken Macintosh, Aileen Campbell, Cathy Peattie, Sandra White, Nicol Stephen*, Lewis Macdonald*
S3M-3731 Fairtrade Inverurie (lodged on 18 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3731 Fairtrade Inverurie (lodged on 18 March 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-3731 Fairtrade Inverurie (lodged on 18 March 2009) Hugh Henry*
